page.title: 08Recreation in Fauldhouse
page.content: There are many games and sports in Fauldhouse.They are mostly played in our {community centre }where there is also a {swimming pool.}There are life-saving clubs and many things like that.There is a{football hall}also. In Victoria Road is the Cricket Club.The Fauldhouse club play many games.It costs a lot for a cricket club membership. The village has six football parks.{Fauldhouse United}have their own private football park . To get in to see a match for a child it is 25p for an adult it is 50p.There is a womans football club in the centre. A{karate club}takes place in the centre,it is on Tuesday and Saturday. For children it costs 75p a night and for an adult, over sixteen, it costs Â£1.00 a night.
